alert.note: Alert for Bath; Elliott; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 3:48PM EST until March 03 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Powell County in east central Kentucky... East central Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Bath County in east central Kentucky... Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Southeastern Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... Western Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 430 PM EST. * At 348 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Odessa to Cornwell to Pilot, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hillsboro around 355 PM EST. Salt Lick around 400 PM EST. Scranton around 405 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bangor, Pelfrey and Vale. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for east central Kentucky. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EST for southeastern and east central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for east central Kentucky. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EST for southeastern and east central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Elliott; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe
